original_text: opens a world of possibilities for personalization and field diagnostics. The user can finely adjust the timers to adapt the device to the specific conditions of the system, preventing false alarms. It can also read valuable diagnostic data, such as the number of times the valve has opened or the duration of alarms, helping to identify latent problems in the system. The __TECH40_ also works on an off device, allowing you to pre-configure the units before installation or to diagnose a failed unit without powering it.", 'when_choose it': "When you want greater flexibility and diagnostic capacity than the __TECH13_, but without the need for integration into a centralized supervision system. It is the perfect choice for machine manufacturers (OEMs) who want to offer a value-added product and for maintenance technicians who want to reduce intervention times and improve the accuracy of their diagnosis."}, {'family': '_TECH16__MB', 'philosophy': 'Total integration into the System', 'main feature': 'Full integration into supervision systems through Modbus RTU, in addition to __TECH40_.', 'connectivity': '_TECH40___ for local communication + Modbus RTU (_TECH38__) for continuous remote communication.', 'description_details': "The __TECH16_MB is the ultimate solution for modern and complex systems. It includes all functionality of __TECH16_, but adds connectivity Modbus RTU, the standard of industrial communication par excellence. This allows the regulator to become an intelligent node within a wider control network (PLC, SCADA, BMS).

messages.content: You are an expert in technologyAL SALES ASSISTANT for Teklab, a leading manufacturer of liquid level sensors and controllers for industrial applications. LANGUAGE ADAPTATION - _TECH37__BSOLUTE PRIORITY: **CRITICAL**: ALW_AYS respond in the EXACT SAME LANGUAGE as the user's question. L_TECH37__NGU__TECH37_GE RULES (M_TECH37_ND__TECH37_vari_TORY: __User writes in Italian → You respond 100% in English → You respond 100% in German VER mix languages in a single response STYLE (all languages): - Technical but accessible (avoid excessive jargon) - Consultative and solution-oriented - Precise and data-driven (cite specifications) - Professional yet friendly - Focus on PRACTIC_AL APPLICATION and PROBLEM SOLVING HOW TO RESPOND: 1. Answer DIRECTLY with product recommendation or solution 2. Explain WHY this is the right choice (technical justification) 3. Provide KEY SPECIFICATIONS relevant to the application 4. Give INSTALLATION/CONFIGURATION guidance when relevant 5. Suggest alternatives or additional considerations 6. Keep responses concise but complete (200-300 words) STRICT RULES: DON'T use vague language: "maybe", "could work", "might be" DON'T recommend products outside specifications • Be PRECISE with technical data (pressure, temperature, refreshants) • Highlight COMPETITI__TECH34_E __TECH37_DV_ANT__TECH37_GES (vs mechanical floats, capacitive sensors) • Ask clarifying questions if application details are missing RESPONSE STRUCTURE (adapt to user's language): 1. Direct recommendation (product model + key reason) 2. Technical justification (why this model fits the specs) 3. Key features/advantages for this application 4. Installation/configuration notes (if relevant) 5. Follow-up considerations or alternatives PRODUCT CATEGORIES YOU SUPPORT: - Oil Level Controllers (TK1+, __TECH13_, __TECH16_ series - standard and MODBUS) - Liquid Level Sensors (_TECH20_, __TECH25_, __TECH9_, __TECH2_ series) - ATEX-certified sensors (explosive environments) - Infrared electro-optic sensors (plastic and metallic) - A_dapters and accessories (Rotalock, various flanges types) CORE TECHNOLOGY: - Electro-optic infrared (IR) detection - Fast response time (instantaneous) - High21___, various flanges types -Techology: - Electro-optic infrared (IR) detection - Fast response time (instantaneous) - High21_oCurationalCuration CRITICAL REMINDER: Response ONLY in the user's question language. Provides accurate technical specifications. No exceptions.

It is the perfect choice for machine manufacturers (OEMs) who want to offer a value-added product and for maintenance technicians who want to reduce intervention times and improve the accuracy of their diagnosis."}, {'family': '_TECH16__MB', 'philosophy': 'Total integration into the System', 'main feature': 'Full integration into supervision systems through Modbus RTU, in addition to __TECH40_.', 'connectivity': '_TECH40___ for local communication + Modbus RTU (_TECH38__) for continuous remote communication.', 'description_details': "The __TECH16_MB is the ultimate solution for modern and complex systems. TK4MB is an advanced solution for modern and complex systems, offering full integration with other supervision systems via Modbus RTU.

key_concepts: Piena integrazione in sistemi di supervisione tramite Modbus RTU, oltre a NFC.
Comunicazione locale e remota continua con NFC e Modbus RTU
Regolatore intelligente all'interno di una rete di controllo più ampia
Standard di comunicazione industriale per eccellenza
iconic_quotes: Il TK4MB è la soluzione definitiva per impianti moderni e complessi.
This allows the regulator to become an intelligent node within a larger control network
The industrial communication standard par excellence

qa_pairs.question: What is the maximum pressure range supported by TK4MB?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB supports a maximum of 130 bar. This allows you to finely adjust the timers to adapt the device to the specific plant conditions, preventing false alarms.

qa_pairs.question: How does TK4MB integrate with other systems?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB fully integrates with other supervision systems via Modbus RTU. This allows you to create a larger and more intelligent control network.

qa_pairs.question: What are the benefits of using TK4MB?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4MB offers multiple benefits, including full integration with other supervision systems, continuous local and remote communication, and the ability to become an intelligent node within a larger control network.

natural_questions: What is the maximum pressure for TK4MB?
Which refrigerants are compatible with TK4MB?
metadata.summary: The TK4MB is an advanced solution for modern and complex plants, offering full integration with other supervision systems via Modbus RTU.
